name: Star Shutter
description:
Shoot for the stars... and other space stuff. Do you have what it takes to become a stellar photographer?

You're going to need a mouse and keyboard for this one, so strap yourself in!

Controls:

- Left click to snap a picture

- TAB to cycle between photo gallery tabs

- ESCAPE to pause

- Right click to save a picture to a folder on your computer (accessed by typing "%localappdata%" on Windows 10 search bar and going to the "Star Shutter" folder)

Good luck, cadet!
